text: Marolles-les-Braults is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, the former commune of Dissé-sous-Ballon was merged into Marolles-les-Braults.Arrêté préfectoral 18 September 2018 == References == Category:Communes in Sarthe
title: Marolles-les-Braults
